title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Itâ€™s simple yet incredibly flavorful, a true comfort food.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While the pasta cooks, crisp the pancetta in a pan.
In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs and cheese together with a generous amount of black pepper.
Drain the pasta and immediately add it to the pan with the pancetta.
Remove the pan from the heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture.
Serve immediately with more cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy. This popular Indian dish is a delight.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until cooked through and slightly charred.
In a separate pan, cook the tomato puree and add spices, then stir in the cream.
Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry with a colorful mix of fresh vegetables. Perfect for a light dinner or a satisfying lunch.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots)
instructions: Heat olive oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, and toss to coat.
Serve hot.

title: Classic Beef Burger
summary: A juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and a special sauce. A timeless favorite for any occasion.
instructions: Season the beef patty with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry the patty to your desired doneness.
Toast the burger bun.
Assemble the burger with the patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Add your favorite condiments and serve immediately.
